figma.description: Figma MCP server for fetching design frames and variables

tools.name: figma.get_frame_png
tools.description: Fetch PNG screenshot of a Figma frame

tools.name: figma.get_variables
tools.description: Fetch design variables from a Figma file

notes: The Figma MCP server must be running and accessible via FIGMA_MCP_URL
FIGMA_MCP_TOKEN is optional but recommended for authenticated requests
Server handles Figma API rate limiting with exponential backoff

optional.name: FIGMA_MCP_TOKEN
optional.description: Bearer token for Figma MCP authentication

optional.name: BASIC_AUTH_USER
optional.description: Basic auth username for protected target URLs

optional.name: BASIC_AUTH_PASS
optional.description: Basic auth password for protected target URLs
